messages.subject: Re: Taking Children's Choices Seriously (was Re: [AlwaysLearning] Re: censors...
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 1/21/2004 9:42:29 AM Central Standard Time, SandraDodd@aol.com writes: For two nights I slept on futons with Marty and Holly.   On the third
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 1/21/2004 9:42:29 AM Central Standard Time,
SandraDodd@... writes:
For two nights I slept on futons with Marty and Holly. On the third day
they were okay to be alone again.

~~~

After watching The Exorcist again, I'd need someone to sleep with ME!

I do remember that Jon and I watched it when he was about 13, but he wasn't
so scared that he couldn't sleep alone. We were both totally freaked out
during the movie, though. Luckily I had little Will to snuggle up with.

Tuck

Tuck


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
